summary: An ordinance relating to the general municipal election to be held March 10, 1931; providing for the submission thereat of the specified charter amendment contemplated by voters' petition (Comptroller's File No. 129642); requiring the City Comptroller and ex-officio City Clerk to certify to the Election Board of King County, Washington, as required by law, said proposed amendment in the form of a specified ballot title and said amendment in full, and declaring an emergency.
